nodes.bodyText: jibConfig.environmentVariables will be null if it is not set.
It will not 😎. I tried it and it's an empty map. But let me try it again to be 100% sure

In general, Quarkus config objects never have null values.
Here is the screenshot from the debugger for a test I did:

Hm I could swear I saw it being null in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/master/extensions/flyway/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/flyway/runtime/FlywayDataSourceRuntimeConfig.java#L113
But maybe because of this: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/master/extensions/flyway/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/flyway/runtime/FlywayDataSourceRuntimeConfig.java#L20
Thanks for proving me wrong, I was annoyed by that ;)
Yeah, I think you found the cause of the null value 👍
